Service Details: Provides a local community resource that offers programs and services including:  Outreach, Resources and Referral, Transportation, Bereavement Support, Wellness Circle, Writers Unblocked, Tai Chi for Wellness, Monday Morning Coffee, Jerry Dober Sunday Breakfast, Sunshine Singers, Tea in the Tranquil Room, Men's Coffee and Cribbage, Volunteer Income Tax Preparation, Computer Literacy, Ladies Crib, Speaker Series, Cooking with Company, Community Gardens, and Seniors Excursions
Hours: Office Hours:  Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 3:00pmSunday Breakfast - Jerry Dober: 8:00am - 11:00am
